title: Ekko or Shen???
body: Im looking to become a top lane main and just was wondering which of these two champions i should buy and learn??

replies.body: but shen has no poke.  so how do i play against champions like teemo or quinn who are ranged?????

you dont, it was broken as fuck when he had it, thats why they nerfed him

you just built hp/onhit/tank items and demolished anything you landed taunt on

and q provided tonnes of poke and sustain and w was always up to dodge damage
btw thankyou to all the answers so far, i have been playing shen this week and have been enjoying him :D
Shen is a little easier to learn and when you build him as a tank, he is harder to kill. You won't get as much kills, but you will contribute to your team more.

Ekko is easier (personally).
But Shen would be better as he is more of a better top meta.
Even though Ekko is top meta already.
you should go shen because shen has more dashes and a better ult just make sure you build static shiv first its a top tier must buy item trust.
